Name: Build PLEXOS Model
Description: Constructs a new PLEXOS model using the specified location and generation type.

Name: Run PLEXOS Model
Description: Runs a previously built model with the specified scenario name.

Name: Analyze Results
Description: Analyzes simulation results with the specified analysis type.

Name: Process Energy Model Request
Description: Processes a complete energy modeling request, extracting parameters and building appropriate models.

Name: Extract Model Parameters
Description: Extracts energy modeling parameters from a user prompt using keyword matching.

Name: Create Single Location Model
Description: Creates an energy model for a specific location and generation type.

Name: Create Simple XML
Description: Creates a simple XML model file when PLEXOS is not available.

Name: Create Multi-Location Model
Description: Creates a combined energy model for multiple locations with the same generation type.

Name: Create Simple Multi-Location XML
Description: Creates a simple XML model file for multiple locations when PLEXOS is not available.

Name: Create Comprehensive Model
Description: Creates a comprehensive energy model covering multiple locations and generation types.

Name: Create Simple Comprehensive XML
Description: Creates a simple XML model file for a comprehensive model when PLEXOS is not available.

Name: Emil
Description: If not other category is appropraite use this.

Name: emil
column10: Create and run energy models using enhanced PLEXOS functionality with comprehensive model building
